description:

Rusty also has a big ol' spike on him. He told me he only jacks off one-handed, but it was taking two hands to work his cock up.
He's a little nervous, but he does engage the audience and has a tremendous cumshot, nearly hitting himself in the face. Tons of jizz matted in his body hair!

title: Rusty - Solo
